subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: T-Mobile, the professional cycling team that began this year with an ambitious plan to reform the sport’s drug problem, lost its sponsor Tuesday because of continuing doping controversies.
snippet: T-Mobile, the professional cycling team that began this year with an ambitious plan to reform the sport’s drug problem, lost its sponsor Tuesday because of continuing doping controversies.
